name: Padundle
description:
► Description ◄

Padundle is a game with the mechanics of pong combined with those of an endless runner/platformer. There is no real goal right now, except to not let the square fall out of the platforms or touch the "death wall" chasing you and to get as far as possible.

(The theme is incorporated by the endless runner with a "death wall" chasing you mechanic)

► Controls ◄

[W/Up][S/Down] → Move paddle up/down

[A/Left][D/Right] → Slow down/Speed up paddle

► Tools ◄

[C#] → Programming Language

[VisualStudio] → IDE

[Unity] → Engine

[Photoshop] → Art

[AbundantMusic] → Music

[SFXR] → SFX

[Bosca Ceoil] → SFX
